qas.question: How many travelling fans did Everton bring with them to Benefica in 2009?
How does the Everton FC promote fans to purchase away tickets?
In what year did Everton take 7,000 travelling fans with them to an away game?
Aside from 2009, in what year did Everton FC bring the most fans with them to an away game?
How many of Everton's travelling fans attended the 1985 European  Cup Winner's Cup Final?
How many season ticket holders does Everton have?
How many travelling fans usually attend Benfica's games?
In what year did Everton start its loyalty points scheme?
In what month was the 1985 European Cup Winners' Cup Final held?

context: Everton regularly take large numbers away from home both domestically and in European fixtures. The club implements a <a1_0>loyalty points<a1_0/> scheme offering the first opportunity to purchase away tickets to season ticket holders who have attended the most away matches. Everton often sell out the full allocation in away grounds and tickets sell particularly well for North West England away matches. In <b8_0>October<b8_0/> <a2_0><b7_0>2009<b7_0/><a2_0/>, Everton took <a0_0><b4_0><b5_0><b6_0>7,000<b6_0/><b5_0/><b4_0/><a0_0/> travelling fans to Benfica, their largest ever away crowd in Europe since the <a3_0>1985<a3_0/> European Cup Winners' Cup Final.
